Class PersonSerializer

extends Object
implements PofSerializer
    This class provides POF serialization of Person.

                   throws IOException
        Deserialize a Person object.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface PofSerializer
        Parameters:
        in - The PofReader to read from
        Returns:
        The Person object read from the input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if the stream does not contain the serialization of a Person object in an expected version.
